title: Trade union facility time (LGTC)
description: Trade union facility engagement and spent on union activities within an organisation.

fields.name: Organisation code
fields.description: A unique code to identify an organisation, preferably a Linked Data URI. Local authorities can search for theirs here: http://uris.opendata.esd.org.uk and is likely to be from http://opendatacommunities.org or ONS http://tinyurl.com/onsgeog

fields.name: Effective date
fields.description: Date at which theï¿¼information provided is true. The UK date format (dd/mm/yyyy) should be used.

fields.name: Total representative count
fields.description: Total number of trade union representatives (including general, learning and health and safety representatives).

fields.name: FTE representatives count
fields.description: Total number (full time equivalent) of staff who are union representatives (including general, learning and health and safety representatives).

fields.name: Total representatives majority duty count
fields.description: Total number of union representatives who devote at least 50 per cent of their time to union duties.

fields.name: FTE representatives majority duty count
fields.description: Total number (full time equivalent) of union representatives who devote at least 50 per cent of their time to union duties.

fields.name: Total estimate spending amount
fields.description: A basic estimate of spending on unions, calculated as the number of full time equivalent days spent on union duties multiplied by the average salary.

fields.name: Relative estimate spending
fields.description: A basic estimate of spending on unions as a percentage of the total pay bill, calculated as the total estimate spending divided by the total pay bill multiplied by 100 per cent.
